title: PlayAudioSegment
description: An action that occurs to play a specified segment of audio as indexed by a UI element.

source.description: A URI fragment to a resource of type array containing https://image.a11y.mcgill.ca/renderers/definitions.json#definitions/labeledSegmentOffsetSeconds.

indexFrom.description: A URI fragment to a UI element that is capable of returning an index from an array. This index is used to selct the audio segment.
